pathAssistantSteps.info:
For this record to be automatically submitted for approval to your Super New BizDev so he/she can move it on to the Quality Prerequisites stage, you need to make sure that :

  • all the K.Y.C. documents are provided by the merchant
  • Those documents are uploaded in the Back Office, and ticked if well uploaded in the Merchant's Profile: Meaning you can't update them Manually.
  • every contractual document has been signed by the merchant
  • every required B2C service has been confirmed by the merchant
  • have sent the Quality Survey (and Language test if needed)
  • a Targeted Country is selected (1 minimum)
  • a Referent Champion is assigned

Before submit for approval to your Head Of NB, make sure :


🛠 To Inquire manually in Saleforce :

BO configurated

Stocks/ads

Shipping Methods

Ads comment

RIB Uploaded (in admin)


 💸  To set up, either in Salesforce or the BO:

BIC/IBAN

VAT number

Commission

Monhly fees
